title: @KateyKhaos BLESS YOUR FACE IT'S FINALLY HAPPENING
body: My body is ready for Deep Sea Nami. My wallet however, not so much.... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Ya, I'm missing 149 RP for it and didn't have plans to buy RP anytime soon so I actually might go without it for a while...
aw, poor DT Nami
I'd be really surprised if she didn't get it gifted,.. twice.
DTN is a dude, but yeah I hope someone does. XD

> [{quoted}](name=MeilinII,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EhEXHH2m,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-24T23:52:26.796+0000)
>
> DTN is a dude, but yeah I hope someone does. XD

Gender of champion > gender of summoner :P

I missed all the hubub on thnat, but my stance ont he matetr is: if someone identifies ass "Nami" I consider them female until they tell me otherwise.

I thought I remembered DTN to be male, but I wasn't sure so I went with the saver bet (;
I'm a fish.
I won a riddle competition for a little bit of RP and now I have 1851 so I can get it :D

You have no idea how hard it was not to say anything I about this skin. 

This was me in development -

http://gph.is/VwN2IC

Ohai, could you shed light on why the skin is called "Deep Sea Nami" and not "Deep Terror Nami" for example? I imagine those two and a few others were taken into consideration, what made you choose one over the other?

'Ello! We did discuss both, but ultimately, we felt she was a bit more lighthearted in terms of thematic/personality, which is why we opted for Deep Sea, as opposed to Deep Terror. She's not a terror. :c

Okay, thanks for the answer!
Enjoy the rest of your day ;)
You're welcome! Same to you! :D
Will the skin have any special interactions with deep terror skins?
No special interactions, no.

aww I would hope future skins would begin to have more interactions with other skins, it makes those games more memorable and unique when special interactions and dialogue occur after certain conditions are met

We agree! In some cases we do have interactions. Taliyah, for example, has several special interactions/VO lines. Caitlyn, Vi and Jinx are other examples! As for skins, it's something we could consider doing more of for legendary skins because they receive new VO!

Yah I notice that with new champions which is cool but I have heard some people complain about certain champions being heard too much. I don't mind but it might be something to keep in mind. Good to know that champions skins going to potentially get more interactions. cough cough project skins cough cough
On a scale of 'called it' to 'I fucking knew it' how much did you know DTN and others would be hyped for this skin? XD
Mmm. I wasn't too sure, actually. There was a ton of fan art for a Deep Sea kind of Nami skin, so I wasn't sure if that would set a prescience or not/skew expectations.
Now i want deep sea urgot, as beautiful as nami >_>
And here I was trying to save my RP. {{item:3070}}
